File /obj/misc/newspaper_box.c

A dispenser for papers. It will sell papers to people for money!

Written by Pinkfish

Started Thu May 24 15:51:25 PDT 2001

Inherits

This class inherits the following classes /std/object.c

Includes

This class includes the following files /include/move_failures.h, /include/shops/bank.h, /include/room/newspaper.h and /include/money.h

Method index

set_paper(string)
This sets the current paper that will be dispensed.

These are functions that everyone can access.

This sets the current paper that will be dispensed.
